ygData.subject: Re: Elfson the Dargonslayer Part2
ygData.msgSnippet: Do you sing McVaxius Berzerker?  I have used my horn with this song if I am in a tank heavy group and will swap out my Gypsy Lute for Niv s and Hymn.  This of
ygData.messageBody:
Do you sing McVaxius' Berzerker? I have used my horn with this song
if I am in a tank heavy group and will swap out my Gypsy Lute for
Niv's and Hymn. This of course is pre-50 :) I like this combo for
tank heavy groups with a light healer.

~Beatdrop Battledrum
48th Bard of the Karana Server


--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Legba Work" <mattdeba@v...> wrote:
> After our successful hit on Nagafen we decided to take on Lady Vox
and the
> Ice Giants last night.
>
> One complete heal (doh!) One Superior Heal (Does that mean she was
low on
> mana?) and 6 dead adventurers later, she fell. I guess the dragon
support
> our bard plight with Verant as she also dropped her insturment, and
this
> time, yours truly was given the horn! Gotta love the stats on this
thing,
> but it bears a question.
>
> When will I ever use it? I haven't pulled out my horn (except to
max my
> brass skill) since lvl 23 I think...
>
> :-)
